name: Warrior
languages: Common, plus one of your choice

trait.name: Battle Readiness
text: The warrior has advantage on initiative rolls.

trait.name: Improved Critical
text: The warrior's attack rolls score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20 on the d20.

trait.name: Martial Role
text: The warrior has one of the following traits of your choice:
• Attacker: The warrior gains a +2 bonus to attack rolls.
• Defender: The warrior gains the Protection reaction below.

action.name: Extra Attack
text: The warrior can attack twice, instead of once, whenever it takes the Attack action on its turn.

action.name: Longsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. 6 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Protection (Defender Only)
text: The warrior imposes disadvantage on the attack roll of a creature within 5 feet of it whose target isn't the warrior. The warrior must be able to see the attacker.

description: Source: Essentials Kit: Storm Lord's Wrath
